column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=webanno.custom.Referent|entity|infstat
#T_RL=webanno.custom.Coref|type|BT_webanno.custom.Referent
#Text=If elected , how would you handle Iraq ?
#Text=I would instruct the Joint Chiefs to draw up a plan for the orderly withdrawal of all U.S. troops from the country .

#Text=I would dismantle our military bases in the area , and I would also demand that U.S. and other international corporations relinquish any claims to Iraqi oil or other resources and withdraw as well .

#Text=I would encourage the Iraqi people to select their own leaders through the ballot box with assistance from the best minds in the universities region and in the world , in very much the same way that the Constitution of the Republic of South Africa was written .

#Text=I would support the establishment of a Truth and Reconciliation Commission to inaugurate a just peace and I would deploy a Peace Corps to the country that would work in concert with the reconstruction needs of the Iraqi people and their leadership .
#Text=I would go further than Iraq .

#Text=I would deconstruct AFRICOM , the new continent-wide U.S. military command set up in Africa , to show the world that the United States has more to share with it than its military might , destabilizing covert operations , nukes , bombs , and missiles .
#Text=I would work with the Congress to make sure that the face of U.S. engagement with the world is not a military one .
#Text=How would you handle abortion ?

#Text=I would not change Roe v. Wade , I would protect and expand women 's reproductive rights , and I would work with Congress to bolster family planning and protection against sexually transmitted diseases here and abroad .

#Text=I would also support better sex education in our schools and community centers , as well as making safe and healthy preventive measures available through heath care providers and community programs to reduce unwanted pregnancies and the spread of HIV/AIDS .
#Text=Many factors come into any woman 's decision to get pregnant or have an abortion .

#Text=We are still missing effective policies to insure safe , affordable and effective birth control for both genders , programs that support education and employment for single parents , courts that insure child support payments , and available health care through pregnancy and childbirth , and for children .
#Text=There are thousands reading this right now .
#Text=What could you say to convince them to give you their vote ?

#Text=People in Argentina , Bolivia , Brazil , Chile , Ecuador , Haiti , India , Italy , Nicaragua , and Spain decided that even during their deepest national tragedies , they would vote their values , their dreams , and their aspirations .
#Text=The governments that resulted were not just face-changes , but were governments reflective of the people 's deep longing for real change .
#Text=As a result , policies are being offered and implemented that reflect the truest values of the people -- they want to enjoy peace and the right of self-determnination .
